scripts.db:migrate: sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.start: export NODE_ENV=development && npm run db:migrate && ts-node index
scripts.start:dev: export NODE_ENV=development && npm run db:migrate && nodemon
scripts.test:contacts: export NODE_ENV=test && npm run db:migrate && ts-mocha contacts/contacts.controller.e2e.ts --exit
